column1: Table 6.4.3: Key findings - Hormonal treatment combined with chemotherapy

column2:
Patients scheduled for long-
term ADT
-  newly diagnosed M1 or N+ 
situations
-  locally advanced (at least two 
of cT3 cT4, ISUP grade > 4, 
PSA > 40 ng/mL)
-  relapsing locally treated 
disease with a PSA > 4 ng/mL 
and a PSA-DT < 6 mo. 
or PSA > 20 ng/mL,
or nodal
or metastatic relapse
